m_szDocTitle: Cadillac CT6 Plug-In Hybrid Coming To Shanghai | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Cadillac CT6 Plug-In Hybrid Coming To Shanghai April 9th, 2015 by Christopher DeMorro   Last week, GM revealed its new flagship luxury car, the Cadillac CT6, which debuts a new naming nomenclature and chassis structure for the brand. While the Cadillac CT6 debuted with a 400 horsepower twin-turbo V6 engine, CEO Johan de Nysschen told The Detroit Bureau that a plug-in hybrid version with similar performance would debut at the Shanghai Auto Show later this month. The timing couldn’t be better, as de Nysschen was just quoted as saying that Cadillac’s only plug-in car, the Volt-based ELR, would no
